justification: Vendor 3 ‘enables intelligent tiered storage… into Hot, Cool, and Archive layers’ which directly maps to storing, organizing, and retrieving data by access frequency and retention. ‘Automated lifecycle policies’ address reducing management effort and costs. The offering explicitly discusses Digital Twin data. No information is given on data retrieval performance or user workflows, preventing a perfect score.
ability: The ability to store, organize and retrieve data  based on how frequently it will be accessed and how long it will be retained.
